item.title: Engine
item.description: This namespace contains all of the necessary engine components.

item.title: Engine::Audio
item.description: Engine::Audio # Classes # Classes Description AudioBuffer A simple audio buffer to hold PCM samples (class) AudioManager An audio manager that accepts multiple Audio::AudioBuffer instances.
